column4: is there a way to temporarily shutdown the computer usage primary host OS on virtualbox? so that all memory could be concentrated on the guest host
es> is there a way to temporarily shutdown the computer usage on the primary host OS on virtualbox? so that all memory could be concentrated on the guest host
all ?   no.   you might trim ship somewhat but not a "pivot_root" type thing, no.
about all you can do is shut down programs and services that are not needed.   you can't "empty" the host system
